mapper.select: select resv.status status, resv.writedate writedate, resv.reservdate reservdate, resv.reservtime reservtime, resv.reservp reservp, res.resname resname, res.website website from member_reserv as resv join restaurant_table as res on res.resno = resv.resno where resv.userid = #{userid} order by resv.no desc
mapper.update: update member_table set usertype=#{usertype} where userid=#{userid}
mapper.delete: select count(userid) from member_table where userid=#{param1}
